SEARCH
Package AES

Class Election

java.lang.Object
AES.Election
Direct Known Subclasses:
CPLElection, MPOElection, MVElection, OPLElection
public abstract class Election extends Object
Abstract class representing a general election. This class defines the structure and necessary operations for managing an election, including processing ballot data, allocating seats, generating audit files, and displaying election winners.

  • Field Details

    • electionType

      protected String electionType
      The type of the election, as a String.

    • allocationData

      protected int[][] allocationData
      A length 5 array, where allocationData[j][i] contains the data for Party i. The data stored depends on j: 0) votes cast; 1) first allocation; 2) remaining votes; 3) second allocation; 4) seats won.

    • partyCount

      protected int partyCount
      The number of parties.

    • candidateCount

      protected int candidateCount
      The number of candidates.

    • ballotCount

      protected int ballotCount
      The number of ballots cast.

    • seatCount

      protected int seatCount
      The number of seats available.

    • headerProcessed

      protected boolean headerProcessed
      Whether a header has been processed.

    • voteCounts

      protected int[] voteCounts
      The flat array of vote counts.

    • parties

      protected Party[] parties
      Stores the parties in the election, where the Party at index i has corresponding Candidate list at index i of candidates.

    • candidates

      protected ArrayList<ArrayList<Candidate>> candidates
      Stores the candidates in the election, where the Candidate list at index i corresponds to the Party at index i of parties.

      public Election()

  • Method Details

    • tiebreak

      public int[] tiebreak(int n, int r)
      Performs a fair tiebreak and returns an array of indices.
      Parameters:
      n - the number of options to choose from; n >= r.
      r - the number of allowed winners; must be positive.
      Returns:
      a sorted integer array containing r unique integers on the range [0, n).
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if n < r or if r <= 0.

    • processHeaderData

      protected abstract int processHeaderData(FileInput fin)
      Processes the header data from a file. The header lines are consumed from the FileInput, and the data structures are initialized if necessary.
      Parameters:
      fin - the file input wrapper, where the next line available is the 2nd line of the original file.
      Returns:
      the ballot count in the current file.

    • storeVoteCounts

      protected abstract void storeVoteCounts()
      Stores vote counts into internal data structures.

    • processBallotData

      protected void processBallotData(FileInput fin)
      Processes the ballot data from the specified file input.
      Parameters:
      fin - the file input wrapper that contains the path to the election data file.

    • allocatePartySeats

      protected void allocatePartySeats()
      Allocates seats to candidates based on the votes received.

    • assignCandidateSeats

      protected abstract void assignCandidateSeats()
      Assigns seats to candidates based on the seats a party receives.

    • generateAuditFile

      public String generateAuditFile() throws RuntimeException
      Creates an audit file for the Election, detailing party, candidate, and seat allocation information.
      Returns:
      the audit file name, or null if one was not generated.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the audit file could not be created.

    • generateElectionInfo

      protected String generateElectionInfo()
      Produces the basic election information for display.
      Returns:
      the election information as a displayable String.

    • generatePartyCandidateList

      protected abstract String generatePartyCandidateList()
      Produces the list of parties and candidates for display, along with vote counts and proportions.
      Returns:
      the list as a displayable String.

    • generateAllocationTable

      protected String generateAllocationTable()
      Produces a readable table containing the party allocation data.
      Returns:
      the table as a displayable String.

    • generateWinnerList

      protected String generateWinnerList()
      Produces the list of winners and their party affiliation.
      Returns:
      the list as a displayable String.

    • generateWinnerDisplay

      public String generateWinnerDisplay()
      Generates a display of the winners of the election and other info.
      Returns:
      the display string containing all relevant info.

    • run

      public abstract void run(FileInput fin)
      Runs the election using the given FileInput.
      Parameters:
      fin - the FileInput containing the desired files.

    • getElectionType

      public String getElectionType()
      Gets election type.
      Returns:
      the election type, "CPL" or "OPL".

    • getAllocationData

      public int[][] getAllocationData()
      Gets a deep copy of the allocation data.
      Returns:
      a deep copy of allocationData.
